value.description: In one hour's time the polls will close in the Rochdale by-election, an electoral show-down already being dubbed the most divisive and chaotic by-election in modern British political history. Labour had hoped that a quick by-election after the sad death of previous MP Sir Tony Lloyd would prevent the poll becoming a bad-tempered circus fought around the divisions of the Israel/Gaza war.
